content:
I'm trying to get the autobuild working using the sushi instructions - and the linked instructions. Both sushi and IG builder run locally, but I get an error on the auto build:

Error Reading JSON Config file at /scratch/ig-build-temp-3CS704/repo: /scratch/ig-build-temp-3CS704/repo (Is a directory)

Complete log:
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7NZ/nzbase/branches/master/failure/build.log
looks to me like you don't have an ig.ini
I am using sushi to generate all the artifacts, but I'll go check...
That was it! (created, but not added to git). Thanks...
